select tct.*, color_result.red_count, color_result.blue_count, color_result.yellow_count, color_result.green_count from (select temp_count.tester_id, sum( case when ((type = 1 and result = 'A') or (type = 2 and result = 'D')) then result_count end ) as red_count, sum( case when ((type = 1 and result = 'B') or (type = 2 and result = 'C')) then result_count end ) as blue_count, sum( case when ((type = 1 and result = 'C') or (type = 2 and result = 'B')) then result_count end ) as yellow_count, sum( case when ((type = 1 and result = 'D') or (type = 2 and result = 'A')) then result_count end ) as green_count from (select ttr.tester_id, ttr.result, count(ttr.id) result_count, tcq.type from tbl_character_result ttr left join tbl_character_question tcq on ttr.question_id = tcq.question_id group by tcq.type, ttr.tester_id, ttr.result) temp_count group by temp_count.tester_id) color_result left join tbl_character_tester tct on tct.tester_id = color_result.tester_id
and tester_name like concat(concat('%',#{tester.testerName}),'%')
and phonenum like concat(concat('%',#{tester.phonenum}),'%')
order by tester_id desc limit ${(page-1)*limit },#{limit}

select count(*) from (select temp_count.tester_id, sum( case when ((type = 1 and result = 'A') or (type = 2 and result = 'D')) then result_count end ) as red_count, sum( case when ((type = 1 and result = 'B') or (type = 2 and result = 'C')) then result_count end ) as blue_count, sum( case when ((type = 1 and result = 'C') or (type = 2 and result = 'B')) then result_count end ) as yellow_count, sum( case when ((type = 1 and result = 'D') or (type = 2 and result = 'A')) then result_count end ) as green_count from (select ttr.tester_id, ttr.result, count(ttr.id) result_count, tcq.type from tbl_character_result ttr left join tbl_character_question tcq on ttr.question_id = tcq.question_id group by tcq.type, ttr.tester_id, ttr.result) temp_count group by temp_count.tester_id) color_result
